description: OPNSense Dashboard metrics from InfluxDB using Telegraf service

targets.query:
from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: Users logged in, usually via ssh.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_users")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Users

targets.query:
from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stopped")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_idle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 100.0 - r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_idle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 100.0 - r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_guest" or r["_field"] == "usage_guest_nice" or r["_field"] == "usage_idle" or r["_field"] == "usage_iowait" or r["_field"] == "usage_irq" or r["_field"] == "usage_nice" or r["_field"] == "usage_softirq" or r["_field"] == "usage_steal" or r["_field"] == "usage_system" or r["_field"] == "usage_user")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "free" or r["_field"] == "active" or r["_field"] == "available" or r["_field"] == "inactive" or r["_field"] == "used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "${wan_interface}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"], timeColumn: "_time")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 8.0 }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "${wan_interface}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"], timeColumn: "_time")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 8.0 }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "${Interface}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"], timeColumn: "_time")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 8.0 }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "${Interface}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"], timeColumn: "_time")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 8.0 }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

title: OPNSense - Firewall
